## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.13g347500](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.13g347500)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmLOX2</u>&nbsp;<u>LOX2</u>
- **Gene Name:** lipoxygenase-2
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Mature soybean seeds contain mainly three lipoxygenase isozymes,GmLOX1,**GmLox2** and GmLox3.
   - Beany flavor induced by three lipoxygenases (LOXs, including LOX1, **LOX2**, and LOX3) restricts human consumption of soybean.
   - GmLox-28 and GmLox-60 were gmlox1**GmLox2**gmlox3 triple mutants and GmLox-40 was a gmlox1**GmLox2** double mutant.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [lipoxygenase isozymes](/tags/lipoxygenase-isozymes/)
